About Me

BIO

I am a full-stack software engineer knowledgable in designing, developing and implementing responsive applications. Educated in social and behavioral sciences, I am passionate about the power technology has to transform our world in a meaningful way and enhance our connection as human beings. I adopt a growth mindset in everything I do and am endlessly excited about strengthening my knowledge and skill set in a way that allows me to continually evolve and innovate as a member of the tech community.
